name: Entity Watch
description:
It's time for your first shift... 

Not having a job for a while, you started applying to everything you find. Then one day you get a weird email:

"YOU have been CHOSEN. 

It's YOUR perfect chance for an easy watch job for a GREAT salary. 

APPLY BELOW"

This is a short 2d horror game inspired by SCP's.

I used sound effects from freesound.org from the following users: drzoom, bmaczero, jarredgibb, blu-150058, inspectorJ, joao-janz, chemicalcrux, xloizlol and strikewhistler. All other assets were made by me.
